originalText.text: Dr Chotkowski is probably the best oral surgeon that I have ever met.  His knowledge and expertise goes far beyond anyone that I have ever consulted with.   His compassion and humanity are above expectations.  I am so very thankful that I finally found this amazing doctor.   I would refer him to everyone.   I have never felt pain nor have I ever experienced anything but extreme satisfaction with his expertise.    Finally an oral surgeon that will exceed all of your expectations.    Thank you Dr.  Chotkowski from the bottom of my heart.   Stacey F

originalText.text: Dr. Chotkowski and staff are one of the most caring and professional dental offices I have ever encountered.  I am a big chicken when it comes to going for any dental work, but Dr. Chotkowski put me immediately at ease with his calm, confident demeanor.   All steps involved in the procedure were thoroughly explained, and Dr. Chotkowski makes it a point to ensure that his patients have all the knowledge they need to make the right decision for themselves.  The best part:  Dr. Chotkowski's surgical expertise left me with NO pain or swelling of any kind.  Only an expert with the right touch is able to achieve such great results.  I highly recommend Dr. Chotkowski for any dental surgery.  On top that, he is a really nice guy!!  Thank you Dr. Chotkowski.  I am smiling already : )

originalText.text: Dr. Chotkowski and his staff were excellent! My procedure was seamless and very easy. Would highly recommend.

originalText.text: I was going to inquire about services w/ this doctor, but once I read this doctor's response to a review was to publish information about his former patient's financial status, I immediately decided against it. Not professional to do such a thing at all!
